Types
Blackboard
Description

Container

Parameters

Container <HashMap>
|___key: "Type" - value: <String> a strict type label
|___key: "Name" - value: <String> descriptive name of blackboard - shorter the better
|___key: "Store" -  value: <Anything> (default: nil) - a place where you can store custom values

  • Some examples of "Store" might be

Namespace

then use setVariable or getVariable

HashMap

then use get/set to modify values

Array

if you want to keep things simple and just have a list of values or multi-dimensional array

Examples
// To Set and use the Store as a <HashMap> on creation
_myBB set ["Store",createhashmap];

// Then to use it later one:
_myBB_Store = _myBB get "Store";
_myBB_Store set ["CustomVar1", "test"];
_myBB_Store set ["CustomVar2", 123];
_myBB_Store set ["CustomVar3", [0,1,"ABC"]];
_myyBB_Store get "CustomVar2"  //returns 123

See Also : xps_fnc_blackboard xps_fnc_container
